content.rendered:
Balkonnect Agenda – Day 2 (24 May)

Continuing the momentum from Day 1, Day 2 of Balkonnect 2024 on May 24 brings specialized sessions aimed at tech enthusiasts, social innovators, and investors. Check out the detailed schedule for a day packed with high-impact discussions: 10:00–11:30 ICT & DigitalDelve into the latest digital trends, innovations in ICT, and…

Balkonnect Agenda – Day 1 (23 May)

Get ready for an exciting start to Balkonnect 2025, featuring industry-specific sessions, networking opportunities, and more. Day 1 promises valuable insights into key sectors like construction, tourism, agriculture, and renewable energy. 10:00–11:00 Opening CeremonyJoin us for the official opening with welcome speeches and keynotes from leading regional entrepreneurs, government officials,…

Thematic Sessions Outline

As part of the upcoming Balkonnect Festival 2025, a series of dynamic thematic sessions will bring together regional and international experts, innovators, and industry leaders to explore the most pressing topics across sectors including construction, tourism, renewable energy, digital technologies, finance, and women entrepreneurship. THE PURPOSE OF THE BALKONNECT FESTIVAL…

excerpt.rendered: Balkonnect Festival 2025 BalkonnectFestival 2025 The Premier Business, Innovation & Investment Event in the Western Balkans Prishtina, Kosovo | May 23-24, 2025 The Balkonnect Festival 2025, set to take place in Prishtina, Kosovo, on May 23-24, is the ultimate platform for fostering business connections, investment opportunities and innovation in the Western Balkans. The…
